all, everyone, everything: places emphasis on the subject of a sentence
Na en srefi ben mus du ala sani.
He himself had to do everything.

A wan sani san mi wani taigi yu ...
The one thing I want to tell you is ...
Het enige dat ik wil zeggen is ...

Na a pasi disi wawan e go na Albina.
This is the only road that goes to Albina.
Slechts deze weg alleen gaat naar Albina.
